mapper.select: select countrycode value, namecn name from m_country order by countrycode
select id value, name from m_department where status=0 order by id

select OPERATORCODE value, concat(case OPERATORNAMECN when 'China Mobile' then '中国移动' when 'China Unicom' then '中国联通' when 'China Telecom' then '中国电信' when 'China Tietong' then '中国铁通' else OPERATORNAMECN end,'（',OPERATORCODE,'）') name from m_operator where status=0 order by case when instr(OPERATORCODE,460)=1 then 1 else 0 end desc
